wikipedia_page.main: Chris Grace (born 29 December 1946), MBE, is a British broadcaster, film director and founder and former CEO of The Shakespeare Schools Festival. In 2000 he was awarded an MBE and a BAFTA special for services to animation.

response: *Chris Grace (broadcaster) (born 1946), British broadcaster, film director and founder and former CEO of The Shakespeare Schools Festival
*Topher Grace (born 1978), American actor also known as Chris Grace
